etymologies: from the scientific name of the subspecies

definitions: a subspecies of the cannabis plant, Cannabis sativa sativa, having a long stem and narrow leaves and grown for hemp fiber as well as for use in drugs

examples.text: sativa plants grow best in warmer environments

definitions: cannabis made from sativa plants and used as a psychoactive (mind-altering) drug. It is sometimes characterized as more stimulating in effect than the indica variety

examples.text: indica mellows you out and sativa boosts your energy and gives you a buzz
